game.name: Swifty
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A fast-paced 2D platformer where speed, precision, and perfect timing are key. Dodge traps, master challenging levels, and become the ultimate "Swifty".
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast-paced 2D platformer where speed, precision, and perfect timing are key. Dodge traps, master challenging levels, and become the ultimate "Swifty".
